pages.text: $(italic)On your journeys through the underground you collect a whole lot of identical blocks, which you will never need again. But they are too good to throw away, you think.$(br2)Time to develop a storage solution that takes care of your little homemade problem.$()

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: The Bottomless Bundle stores a virtually unlimited number of items, but of only one type.

pages.title: Enchanting - Power
pages.text: Enchanting a Bottomless Bundle with Power by using the $(l:enchanting/enchanting_items)Enchanter$(/l) you can increase its capacity tenfold for each level of Power.$(br2)Are you able to fill a Bottomless Bundle with Power V?

pages.title: Curse of the Void
pages.text: Enchanting a Bottomless Bundle with Curse of the Void by using the $(l:enchanting/enchanting_items)Enchanter$(/l) all items that would overfill the Bottomless Bundle are voided instead.$(br2)No more useless blocks dropping your sight when mining.
